article.class: et_pb_post post-4122405 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-district-news category-general category-nutritionservices

div.h1: Meals for kids during school closure
div.p: by kendalll | Mar 30, 2020 | District News, General, Nutrition Services |
Beginning Monday, March 30, weekly meals will be distributed at Clover Ridge Elementary and Riverview Terrace two days each week, or by delivery upon request.

span.strong: On Mondays — we will distribute meals for Monday and Tuesday
On Wednesday — we will distribute meals for Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday.

li.strong: On Wednesdays — families who have signed up for Sheridan Story weekend food bags can pick up their orders at noon at Clover Ridge Elementary and Riverview Terrace.

div.p: If families have already requested delivery, that request carries over and they do not need to contact us again. Families can contact us with questions or to request delivery — 952-556-6150 or email Nutrition@District112.org.

li.a: Need for meals continues to grow
District earns Certificate of Excellence in Finance Reporting Award
